Module melange.common
Package gbw.melange.common.elementary.types

Interface ISpacerElement

All Superinterfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, IConstrainedElement
public interface ISpacerElement extends IConstrainedElement
Represents empty space. If a nearby element has SizingPolicy.FIT_CONTENT, it will take priority in terms of space use.
